title: Handle Customer Account Consolidation
description: A retail company acquires another, and they want to consolidate their two separate accounts into one.

tasks.description: Identify the two customer accounts to be merged.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the details for both accounts.

tasks.description: Merge the order history and contact information from the secondary account into the primary account.
tasks.expected_outcome: All historical data is consolidated under one account.
The old account is marked as inactive.
